## Application.interceptor() method

Register an interceptor

**Signature:**

```typescript
interceptor(interceptor: Interceptor | Constructor<Provider<Interceptor>>, nameOrOptions?: string | InterceptorBindingOptions): Binding<Interceptor>;
```
